extensionName.message: pdso: Page DOM Snapshot for Offline

extensionDescription.message: Take a static snapshot of the page DOM, (modify and) save it for offline viewing, including CSS styles and images, no script.  (An extension for Desktop and Android Firefox)

po_title.message: Options of pdso: Page DOM Snapshot for Offline

po_theme_is_dark.description: for PageMain.AppBar, when theme is dark

po_enable_dark_theme.description: for PageMain.AppBar, when theme is light

pot_switch_tooltip_enable.description: tooltip text when tab is enabled

pot_switch_tooltip_disable.message: Click to enable this tab (current disabled)
pot_switch_tooltip_disable.description: tooltip text when tab is disabled

pot_snapshot_tooltip_reset.message: Take a snapshot of this page
pot_snapshot_tooltip_reset.description: tooltip text when tab after reset

pot_snapshot_tooltip_no_reset.message: Can not snapshot before page reset
pot_snapshot_tooltip_no_reset.description: tooltip text when tab without reset

pot_enable_all.message: Enable for all pages by default

pot_enable_all_desc.description: description text of enable for all
